sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import products from '../products' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const ProductScreen = () => { const { id } = useParams() const product = products.find(product => product._id === id) return ( <> Go ðŸ”™ Back {product.name} Price: ${product.price} Rating:${product.rating} ) } export default ProductScreen
